ing: 6 slices bacon - cooked, drained, and chopped
des: "This is a quick and easy appetizer to whip together for any occasion. It never lasts long with my friends or even when I make it for myself!"
ins: Stir together sour cream, mayonnaise, cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, chopped onion, tomato and bacon in a bowl until well mixed.  Chill for two hours before serving.
